name: Indigo Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Cool Spices.Key Notes:Bergamot, Spices.Fragrance Description:This exotic eau de parfum is an exploration of the Mediterranean with notes of Italian lemon, orange bergamot, Moroccan tea, Kashmir wood, and wild figs from the south of France..About the Bottle:Inspired by the works of 18th-century British artist Mrs. Mary Delany, NEST New York founder Laura Slatkin collaborated with master perfumers to translate these works of art into luxurious perfumes that capture the essence of each of the botanicals that adorn the products' striking packaging..About the Fragrance:Laura Slatkin was inspired by a trip she took to Europe where she visited noteworthy perfumeries and apothecaries. When visiting a tea shop on Bond Street in London, she experienced the Moroccan tea aroma. It was so exceptional that years later, it became the inspiration for this extraordinary fragrance.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance, Water, Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Geraniol, Citronellol, Citral, Benzyl Alcohol, Coumarin.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This particular fragrance is not overpowering, but subtle and sexy. It is a hint sweet and quite earthy and could be worn by any gender IMO. I'd go feral if my husband wore this. I apply any perfume sparingly in the classic way of assuming only someone who is in my personal space should be able to smell it. This lasts a good few hours on my skin before  you really have to try to smell it. Clings pleasantly to clothes. And my husband who is sensitive to fragrance and would rather none was worn at all, actually likes this one cause it stays close to me. I got a sample of this with an order about 2 years ago and have been obsessed ever since, used it sparingly - for date night or events and it's finally time to buy myself a proper bottle. In general I'm a gourmands kind of girl, out of convenience, because it's easy to spot an overpowering sweet fragrance from a mile off. Spiced woodsy ones I can think I like when I spray it on a tester then get it home and actually use it only to want to seal off my nostrils and burn whatever it came into contact with. I recently tried Indigo on a tester strip while away from home and considering purchasing it again. And it didn't smell anywhere near as intriguing as it does on my skin, so there's a chance I would have passed it up if I didn't know how well it complimented me. Makes me feel like sexy modern witch tbh

reviews.review_title: Mine went bad after a few months!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has been on my wishlist for years! Anytime Iu2019d go into Sephora Iu2019d take a deep wig and dream of owning it. Finally this Summer (2022) I decided to treat myself for my bday. A few months later I sprayed it on and was surprised it didnu2019t smell the same anymore! At first I didnu2019t think much of it. Then later when I used it again I realized it really had changed! I had my husband and some of my co-workers smell it to make sure I wasnu2019t crazy. I even took it to the Sephora that I bought it at and everyone agreed it smelled rancid. It did not smell like it originally did. I have no idea what happened! I tried googling how long perfume last and how do they go bad. But since Iu2019ve only had this perfume for about 3 or 4 months it didnu2019t make any sense! The employee at Sephora said because it had been longer than the 30 day return policy they couldnu2019t do anything for me. So I donu2019t really know what to do! Iu2019m so sad this happened! I donu2019t normally spend $80 something on perfume and when I did, I thought it would have lasted longer! Such a waste! And no help or explanation at all. I wonu2019t wear it anymore because it smells like rotten old lady perfume thatu2019s been expired for 20 years.

reviews.review_text: I find this product rather pleasing and long lasting. I got this a few months ago and have been involve ever since!! For me it seems like a more fall/end of summer scent. I have also gotten many compliments about this perfume. It's more of a unique perfume as I don't really know anyone else who uses Nest perfumes and opt for the more popular brands. If you want a perfume that not a lot of people know about go for it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Supper inoffensive light perfume. This is perfect for the office or everyday. Itu2019s a very unique light perfume that smells a little like tea

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so good and unique I got so many compliments wearing this and people asking what perfume is that itu2019s amazing I highly recommend this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this fragrance.  I received it as a sample and fell in love right away.  It lasts all day and then some.  It's not over powering or perfume-y.  It's a nice blend of scents.  At first I smell fruit, then when smelling a little deeper, the scent of tea and the woodsy fragrance comes out.  It's different and complex, but so beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great, but staying power is non existent. Other Nest perfumes last on sweaters FOREVER. This is gone in an hour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want so badly to give this a 5! But the stay power is almost non existent :/ Like literally less than an hour and I have to literally smoosh my wrist up to my nose to smell itu2026strange for an eau de parfum! If it stayed longer I would make this my signature scent in a heartbeat.   It is a very feminine and sexy smell, bit earthy, bit floralu2026something mouthwateringly sweet about it! I could smell it all day long! And I am sensitive to some scents, some u201cfill me upu201d in the chest and throat but this one doesnu2019t give me even the slightest tickleu2026so disappointed in the stay power thoughu2026I would power through a bottle too quickly to justify spending the money on itu2026but then again I love it enough maybe I will have to get it anyway lol. When the tester is gone I will be going through withdrawals!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a yum yum smell. Smells sooooo good. I love it and really recommend it
I also received this as a sample and am glad I did. It is a good blend of fresh and seductive. Will put this on my future purchase list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this in my order and I am loving this. It smells so sexy to me. Itu2019s definitely warm but I pick up on the bergamot and the tea. I would definitely purchase this. This is the second Nest scent that I have tried and not been disappointed. Wish they had a sampler besides the oils.

reviews.review_title: Not what I was expectingu2026in a bad way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I always like to do fragrance sample options and because I work at Sephora and see this scent sold a lot, I was excited to see it. Boy was I disappointed. I didnu2019t even smell it before spraying myself, fresh after all my skincare was done I sprayed my wrist and chest and was overwhelmed with a black licorice-like scent. I immediately had to put my My Way over it to help mask the scent. I literally almost had to reshower I hated it so much alone :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most unique, beautiful and eccentric scent Iu2019ve ever tried! I love how it is light, airy, but yet the Woody tones grounds it all, adding just enough maturity. It smells simple.. yet so detailed and sophisticated. I got complimented the first time I wore it out! For me personally, it starts of on my skin with a opening burst of light jammy fruits, combined with blossoming sweet, yet delicate florals. Itu2019s fresh and sweet! As it dried down, the Woody scents reveals themselves, I love the Moroccan tea scent along with the black cardamomu2026 aromatic and mysterious.   The scent of this perfume reminds me of my vacation in Dubai. When I smell it, it almost feels like Iu2019m out in on my balcony in the early spring morning after it has lightly rained, the sun is now shining through, the im surrounded by lush green trees and leaves with some harmonizing fruits and flowers blooming on them, while I read a magazine sipping my morning tea.   Worth the try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! Received a small sample with my package and itu2019s definitely perfect for the fall/winter! Will be purchasing.
Absolutely incredible!!!! My boyfriend LOVES this perfume!!! It is similar to The One by Dolce & Gabbana, but not as overpowering. Bottle is beautiful, too. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: beautiful and unique scent. I get compliments on it all the time and it is long-wearing. No harsh synthetic smell like many other perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This reminds me of Kat Von D's Sinner in a way, it'spretty basic.. it has that dark, brooding smell that overpowers you. Kind of jammy. Not a fan of this unfortunately. I find Nest fragrances a little overwhelming to begin with and heavy on the chemical-y sillage, mind you their new line of perfume oils are pretty nice so I will give them that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is really gorgeous, however I could see how it isn't to everyone's taste.  It smells strongly of juniper berries and bergamot but isn't a simple boring scent.  It has depth to it and is very unique, perfect for someone who loves a relaxing herbal scent.  It is not to masculine which I find a lot of woodsy scents to be, it is feminine but not sweet.  The longevity is not the greatest which is why I gave it 4 stars.  Highly recommend trying the rollerball before buying a full size, probably not a safe blind buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I first smelled this in a Sephora in Chicago, I had never heard of Nest Fragrances BUT I WAS HOOKED! The scent is stunning in my opinion and lasts forever. It's seriously like nothing I have ever smelled before, and when I shop for a new fragrance I prefer something that doesn't smell floral and ordinary. Indigo's sent is so calming, yet has punchy notes which poke out during the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly the most relaxing scent Iu2019ve smelled in a long time. You donu2019t see much out there about Nest New York but this fragrance is amazing! I personally use it every night as a sleep fragrance because itu2019s so calming for me. I canu2019t really speak to its longevity other than saying I spray it on myself and can still smell it close to my skin 12 hours later because I use this right before going to sleep. I would imagine with that being said it lasts for quite a long time. Projection isnu2019t anything amazingly crazy so I would imagine this would be a safe wear during the warmer days too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has a really weird undertone. I didnu2019t notice it at first when I smelled it in the store, but when I wore it the next day, the longer I smelled it as the hours passed, I kept smelling tobacco. The undertones of this perfume is u201cteau201d so Iu2019m assuming that thatu2019s where Iu2019m getting the wet tobacco leaf smell from.  I didnu2019t like it and I returned it for a different scent because it smelled really gross in my opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing scent. Not typical, it stands out - in a really good way. Itu2019s spicy, woodsy and mildly floral (like really, really mildly floral). Itu2019s not overpowering at all. The fragrance doesnu2019t last a long time, I find myself refreshing every hour/hour and a half. This is a really good scent for the fall/winter season!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this perfume and fell in love! It has an alcohol smell in the beginning but then it disappears and you are left with a sweet and fresh smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very fresh. To me it smells like a woman's shampoo, very clean and soapy. Not my style but I like the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it smells like my OGX  tea tree and mint shampoo which makes sense given the ingredients in the scent. I like the smell but can't say that I love it. it's a nice smell for hair but definitely different having all of me smelling like shampoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite perfume and signature smell. It has a unique scent and to me doesn't fade away, it has a strong smell and honestly not everybody is going to like it, but give it a try. You'll either love it or hate it.  But if you want people to remember you, this is the perfume to get.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s very nice at first, but over time, wears off into more of a cigarette smoke scent, at least with my skin and personal experience. Iu2019ll admit I used the coffret that comes in the discovery set, but itu2019s a large sample, and I canu2019t bring myself to use it. I loved the first whiff but as it wears throughout the day, it really reminds me of my grandparentsu2019 house. Specifically, their smoking room.
Omg I am totally obsessed with this perfume! The fragrance is so unique! It's a cut above my collection of perfumes.

reviews.review_title: Get this now so they never stop selling it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wowwwwww. Iu2019m soooo happy with the way this smells. I normally wear Chanel chance, or very sexy, but after reading the reviews I had to try it and Iu2019m so glad I did. I canu2019t stop smelling myself. I just want to go do something so people smell me . Lol. I also love that the smell was inspired by the art, itu2019s that beautiful. I want to try all the nest fragrances but itu2019s gonna be real hard to peel away from this one. I ran to write a review because this will change your life. Smell good, feel good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot get enough of this scent! The lady in the fragrance section had me try it out and I could not be happier with it. It has good longevity. The initial notes are bright and fragrant, and the dry down is cool, woody, and so yummy! Iu2019m a huge fan of fig and bergamot notes so thatu2019s a plus as well. 10/10 would recommend this fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume. I have smelled this before but I can't really pin down the fragrance. I think it is a fragrance that can be used during the day and night. It is sweet but not too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: wore it to a 9 hour shift at a cafe with no air conditioning during the summer and then out to dinner right after and 12 hours later my friends could still smell it. gorgeous scent and wears down super well. quickly becoming my new signature scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My BFF purchased a scent kit for my bday and indigo was one of the samples. I ended up going with the 1.70 oz bottle of this with the certificate that came with the kit. Omg this is my signature fragrance. It smells divine on me and I always get complimented when I wear it. Itu2019s great for any season bc it still has spice, though it has a sweet note to it. Def recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I literally never write reviews but I felt the need to after I repurchased this for the third time. This is such a unique and amazing scentu2026thereu2019s nothing quite like it. It is fruity but still warm. I have worn this everyday for the past three years and I still canu2019t get enough of it.

reviews.review_title: A bottle of sultry purply botanical air
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A dark, cool, complex, rainforest-like sultry scent that is very much like the atmospheric botanical image gracing its bottle. Super long-lasting, develops beautifully. Placed me in such a confident, sensuous frame of mind that I almost made a really bad decision.  but, it is rolling the dice for a headache. That (along with its use of artificial untested chemicals & benzyl alcohol) means I use it much more sparingly than cleaner perfumes from competing brands.   still, a gem

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fragrantica has a delicious description of this perfume calling the opening notes 'jammy'.  It dries down to innocent yet sinister sandalwood.  This is the dark purple lipstick of fragrance.  Good on everyone.  I apply it to the back of my hands before I style someone's hair.  My clients love the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: a seriously fantastic scent. sweet, peppery, musky but also clean. really love it. staying power is okay, i carry the travel size around to reapply once a day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am utterly speechless by this. It takes a lot to make a perfume leave me speechless. I've had almost 100 perfumes in my 28 years and I have never tried any NEST - I can't tell you why. I got a sample of this and I am legit speechless. I don't usually like sweet, warm scents but this is so different. This has a hidden layer of Loverdose by Diesel but like there are probably 3 others layers that blend into that smell that leave me wanting more. It's sweet but with depth and curiosity. I am buying a full size asap because I can't fathom my life without this - I am excited to try NEST's other scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this! Itu2019s such a unique scent. I have no other perfumes thatu2019s smell the same!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the Sephora Perfume Sampler. When I first put it on , it reminded me of a fruity scent from Bath and Body Works. Then....after 30 minutes I absolutely loved it, smelled fantastic, fresh, sexy, intriguing. completely changed into something unbelievable, This will be the one I choose from the sampler. Plus, I LOVE the packaging and Indigo is my cats name.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a deluxe sample in the Motheru2019s Day sampler pack. I was planning on using my scent certificate for either Chloe or Toccau2019s Florence but this fragrance intrigues me. Itu2019s hard to categorize. It reminds me of a perfume Philosophy used to have called mint tea, but slightly more complex. Itu2019s not clearly a summer scent or a winter scent. Itu2019s not really a wood or a floral. Itu2019s this kind of funky in-between that Iu2019m here for. It also doesnu2019t hit high in the nose and give me a headache. Not sure if Iu2019ll spend my scent certificate on it or just wear the deluxe sample until it runs out but I am impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful scent! It reminds me of what a Sephora store smells like!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very special perfume, I get compliments every time I wear it, makes me feel very cozy and fresh at the same time. I donu2019t have anything like this, this is a staple and will always keep it in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite perfumes! I have a really hard time with most perfumes. My nose is super sensitive, and most scents give me a massive headache, but not this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was part of a Sephora sampler set, and stands out among all of the other fragrances. It kind of reminds me of the most cliche 90s scent there is - CKOne. But better. It's fresher, cleaner, but also kind of sultry. It's just so unique. I can't wait to get a full size bottle. Love it.

reviews.review_title: Earl Grey tea, in the best way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning and unique! Do you like Earl Grey tea?? Because you will ADORE this if you do. On the heavy fall/winter side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this perfume as a sample. When I used it everybody in my work interested in the name of it. It is very ordinary simultaneously unique scent. In a simple, it reminds the warm feeling, such as you are on vacation in winter and steep tea and after the steeping the room full of the new fresh teau2618ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was visiting a friend in Chicago last winter, gave her a hug at the airport and within 5 seconds I was yelling u201cWHAT PERFUME IS THATu201d. It was nest indigo; bought it for myself and never looked back. I donu2019t have any other perfume that smells like this. Itu2019s the perfect balance of mature, sexy but wearable at the same time. Iu2019ve grown out of the vanilla gourmands, they become too sickly and I feel like they all sort of smell the same but I also want something sexier than just fresh laundry in a bottle. The fig gives it this juicy feel that is dark and sexy but the tea and the bergamot make it very interesting and unique. I never thought I could find ONE perfume that works for all seasons and occasions. Itu2019s sexy enough to be worn on a date or a nice dinner but also not so in your face that it couldnu2019t be work appropriate. On my friend it was very bergamot-y and almost minty on her. On me the fig is in the forefront. Perfume smells different on everyone so I wouldnu2019t ever suggest blind buying this..get a tester before the splurge. However I canu2019t imagine anyone hating this. Itu2019s delicious, woody and comforting in the best way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Rather than thinking more about Covid, I decided to make a perfume purchase!!  This was a blind purchase, I have never smelled a Nest perfume before and do not know anyone that has one so.............I am so glad I got it.  The smell is definitely warm and rich while being ohhhhh so sexy.  A little goes a long way.  As of yet, I do not know about longevity but I am not worried about that (as I would be for a TOM FORD or Killian purchase).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fig in it makes it too sweet for me and takes away from the beautiful bergamot, I reach for black tulip more

reviews.review_title: Scent is less intense than sample
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample and didnu2019t use it until very recently. The sample SMELLS AMAZING. It really encouraged me to get the full-sized bottle thinking itu2019ll be just as strong, but when I got my order, it smells as if it has more alcohol. Not very happy with it u2014 but the scent in general is lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance so much! It takes me back to the wonderfully carefree and sunny late summer days I've spent plucking bucketfuls of blackberries off brambles in short denim shorts, tank top, and tennis shoes. It reminds me of that warm deep sunshine-y burst of flavour one might enjoy upon popping a particularly plump berry into one's mouth with the spicy woodsy scent of the outdoors in the heat. Hot, sexy, young, sweet (more deep than cloying). Delicious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: What does a cool spice smell like? To me this smells like NyQuil or Ju00e4germeister! I canu2019t do it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Indescribable...but in the best way possible. I usually only wear this when I see my boyfriend so every time I smell it, I know something's gonna go down. It feels very empowering and seducing to wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample and used it up within no time and just had to buy the full size. Itu2019s mature but playful, thereu2019s really no scent like it. In love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume so much, I'm now on my second bottle. It has truly become my signature scent. The smell is spicy and deep without being cloying. The deeper notes make the fragrance last on your skin all day, and I find that it takes on a fruitier scent as it wears, more like a black raspberry scent. So lovely and lasts forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The is honestly the best thing Iu2019ve ever smelt in my life. I canu2019t wait to go out so I can wear it. I donu2019t know much about perfumes so I canu2019t explain the smell but just know you NEED to buy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is so unique and wonderful I just want to take a bath in it. Itu2019s spicy, floral, but not overwhelming. It is my new favorite perfume and if you are thinking of buying it I say go for it! Treat yoself. My only regret is not buying the larger size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and it became one of my favourite scent.  It is really enchanting and mysterious fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and it became one of my favourite scent.  It is really enchanting and mysterious fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in a rollerball and absolutely love it<3 itu2019s a fruity and fresh scent, with strong notes of eucalyptus when first applied to your skin, but when it is left on the skin it gets more of a fruity, blackberry smell. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I find this scent to be very fruity - maybe something similar to blackberry. It's kind of a little bit spicy but overall it's more fruity. It smells fresh and not like a synthetic type of fruit. It's very inviting and I like it a lot. There's also a sweetness to it. I'd call it a daytime perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: omg this scent is delicious! not in a good way, but in a complex and sweet way. it isnu2019t too overpowering, yet i could still smell it on myself hours after i sprayed it. the fig, bergamot and tea notes give this scent a wonderfully rich, jammy quality. the opening is super sweet with mostly the fig and bergamot. the dry down is woody and spicy, as the cardamom and woods come through stronger. i really havenu2019t smelled anything like this, and i absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing this perfume for years, I think I've been through 4-5 bottles. It's super unique and I get tons of compliments. It's all I wear and I'm obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s really comparable to Black Opium (except a little more on the exotic/fruity side, but not to much I donu2019t enjoy fruity smells and itu2019s more on the spicy sweet than anything). Itu2019s really well balanced on the sweet-spicy-fruity-punchy. Itu2019s also more of a u201cclose to youu201d fragrance than u201ceverybody in the room will smell youu201d. I took one start because, for a perfume, the staying power could be longer. Really beautiful fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i got this as a sample and i really like the smell. it smells like an expensive hotel if that makes sense to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample and would not purchase. It is an interesting scent, for sure, but the sugary sweetness is giving me cotton candy vibes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this scent! Itu2019s a warm, spicy perfume perfect for fall/winter months or anytime you want to wear a different type of scent. Itu2019s not floral or the typical u201cgirlyu201d perfume. Itu2019s vegan and cruelty free too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is unlike anything Iu2019ve ever smelled or tried before. Itu2019s spicy with a hint of sweet and an undercurrent of heady richness. Packaging is very luxe and pretty, I enjoy that NEST describes their scents through the visual on their bottles. The scent is powerful without being overwhelming. I get many compliments on this. Happy to have it as a signature scent because of its uniqueness! Donu2019t hesitate to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The first high end perfume I have ever gotten! Iu2019m usually sensitive to scents and most I can find overwhelming and strong yet I want it to last long. This smells so wonderful, almost like spicy blueberries and pair well with the lotions I use to last long yet it lasts long by itself. I personally dislike the design but it smells good and now a staple in my routine til I find a new perfume

reviews.review_title: I'll never get sick of this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best scents I've ever come across. Nothing else really smells anything close to it. It's warm and mysterious, if that makes sense. Everyone complements me on it, even those who usually wouldn't make any comment lol. It's perfect for the Fall/Winter months, but is great all year round. Please give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is perfect. Itu2019s warm and inviting, not too girly. Spicy and so pleasant. Itu2019s different and I have had such a hard time finding any other scent that could possibly suit me better than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely stunning scent. It is sophisticated without smelling old fashioned, warm, and comforting. It lasts all day without being too strong and never irritates my eyes or nose. It smells amazing from the first spritz to the last time I smell it in the evening. The bottle is absolutely stunning, as well. It is the perfect fall and winter scent for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for me. I need citrus with a little spice to last all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My fav perfume. Lasts all day and the scent is for perfect all seasons.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've repurchased this several times and I'm excited to see they're offering a 100mL size now - a better bang for your buck. I just love this scent. It's not too floral and it's great for everyday wear.. warm but not too warm.. I don't know how to describe it other than it's a lovely, different scent and I clearly love it as I've probably bought 3-4 - I always keep it in my rotation. Have received many compliments while wearing as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well this is different. Itu2019s not bad, but I canu2019t say itu2019s a fit for me, either. The first hit when I sprayed it on was definitely fruity - like fresh cut apple, with a touch of citrus, kind of like lime,  but not quite. The tea note is fresh like sweet tea. Itu2019s nice, but I spent all day trying to figure out where I smelled this before and when I figured it out I was less wild about it: it smells like that sweet powdered lemon iced tea mix that was big in the 70u2019s.  Thatu2019s not the only things it smells like but there is enough of it that I recognized it. There is also something woodsy and teeny bit pungent like balsam and a faint soft dusky floral and a touch of spice. This is one you will want to try before you buy and give it a day or two. It is quite unique. Earthy, funky, fresh, tangy. I canu2019t decide if I like it or not. I donu2019t dislike it, but Iu2019m doubtful Iu2019d purchase the full size. I can see wearing it once in awhile in a certain mood. I recommend trying it if you are searching for a new scent - I know I have nothing like this. Out of all the Nest scents, at least this one is interesting, which is what I was hoping for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No other fragrance smells like this!  Seriously. I have always been a fragrance connoisseur.  But, while in clinical rotations, I was searching for a fresh, sweet, slightly musky fragrance that was in no way overwhelming.  As a RN, I must exercise extreme caution wearing perfumes, as patients can can suffer hypersensitivity, allergic, even anaphylactic reactions to perfume.  That is when I stumbled upon this unique gem. I receive only the most complimenting comments regarding my u201cscentu201d.  Even fellow nurses tell me that I smell u201cdelicious.u201d  There is no other perfume on the planet that smells even remotely close to this!  The dry down smells just as it does on application.  Not too sweet. Not too floral nor too fresh. Just sheer perfection.  I have yet to have a patient or colleague suffer any sort of reaction to it nor have I received a single complaint.  I typically pair this w/ LaVanila Healthy Body butter in Pure Vanilla (another safe bet delicious scent when working in healthcare).  The scent also has serious staying power, lasting far beyond those 12 hours shifts.  Worth every single penny, IMO

reviews.review_text: I don't like most perfumes. They're too floral-y and sweet. Nest, as a brand, tends to have some of the best fragrances (Juliette Has a Gun is a close second) for a non-perfume person. Indigo is far and away the best perfume I've ever tried. It does have flowers in it, but it isn't your typical flower bomb. It's an earthy, woody fragrance that's still entirely feminine. Sultry is the word I would use to describe it. It has great staying power, too.
